snippet.title: American Arcadia - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description:
Meet Trevor, learn about his plight and the dangers that await him for being unpopular, and see gameplay in this latest trailer for American Arcadia. American Arcadia is an upcoming cinematic puzzle game that combines a 2.5D platformer and a first-person game to tell the tale of a thrilling escape. In American Arcadia, experience the extraordinary story of Trevor, an average man escaping from the world's most popular reality TV show. American Arcadia will be available on PC.

#Gaming
